text:
Stars of the show: Mickey and Minnie Mouse at Disneyland Paris resort Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
We know fairytales don't exist, but Mickey Mouse and Donald Duck do, and they live in Disneyland. 
Okay, so that's not entirely true, but you can actually meet your favourite Disney characters in a little town called Marne-la-Vallée in Paris, also known as the home of Walt Disney - Disneyland Paris . 
But Disneyland doesn't come cheap . Book last minute and you may find yourself paying hundreds per person, especially during the peak booking periods - January and July through to August, so finding a good deal could save you hundreds of pounds. 
Luckily, 2017 marks the year that Disneyland has been open for a whole 25 years, meaning that not only are they putting on a super spectacular show, but they also have an incredible anniversary deal, giving away two free days and nights. 
If you're booking a Disneyland escape, we've got the lowdown on how you can take full-advantage of this 25th anniversary offer, plus how to bag free travel there, and a few other handy deals that may tickle your fancy listed below (day tickets which cost less than £28 per person, anyone?). Read More Cheap holiday deals for 2017: The best New Year sale offers from Thomson, Virgin Atlantic and more 
Comprising over 4,800 acres, Disneyland Paris is every child's dream, complete with two theme parks, multiple resort hotels, a shopping and entertainment complex and the lifetime opportunity to MEET your favourite characters. 
For other cheap family trips abroad, check out our 10 best European campsite deals , or 2017 offers on Eurocamp . For cheap days out in the UK, see our Legoland deals and Butlins holiday pages. Up to 2 nights & 2 days free Disneyland Paris' 25th anniversary means there's an insane amount of deals up for grabs 
For their 25th anniversary offer, Disneyland Paris are giving away two free nights and two free days to celebrate the magical kingdom, plus free hotel and park tickets for kids under 7 and free transport! 
The offer is available on all 2, 3 and 4 night packages between the 29th March and 30th October 2017 - including the summer holidays - with free transport being just one of three travel options offered to each package. 
You can pick from one of three transport deals to add to your booking, choosing between kids under 7 fly free, a free P&O ferry, or a free Eurostar upgrade to Standard Premier class. 
Just make sure you book yours here before 6 February 2017. Read More Eurocamp holidays 2017: Get up to 20% off summer breaks, plus how to save money on camping getaways Top 3 Disneyland Paris package deals 
All prices are based on 5 days and 4 nights, for 2 adults and 2 children under 7 (1 room, 2 double beds), departing on 29 March 2017. Eurostar: from £1,139.08 
Stay at Disney’s Hotel Santa Fe including return travel from London St Pancras on the direct Eurostar to Disneyland Paris. 
The price includes the Early Booking offer of 2 nights & 2 days free, plus free hotel and park tickets for the kids, with Eurostar booked in combination with Disneyland park stay. Book here. Flights from Birmingham: from £939.12 
Stay at Disney’s Hotel Santa Fe including return flights with Flybe from Birmingham airport to Paris Charles De Gaulle. 
The price includes the Early Booking offer of 2 nights & 2 days free, plus free hotel, park tickets and Flybe flights for the kids (including airport transfers). Book here. By Ferry: from £603.08 
Stay at Disney’s Hotel Santa Fe including return travel via P&O ferries in a standard car on the Dover to Calais route. 
The price includes the Early Booking offer of 2 nights & 2 days free, plus free hotel, park tickets and P&O ferry (including 1 free child meal with 1 paying adult on board). Book here. 
Cheap camping holidays: 10 best-value European campsites for a bargain summer getaway Up to 46% off all Disneyland Paris tickets 
Bookings website 365 Tickets is offering an 46% off children's Disneyland Paris tickets , now £27.72 (was £51) and 42% off adult tickets , now £33.27 (was £57). 
To book yours, visit 365tickets.co.uk/disneyland-paris . 2 parks for the price of 1 Pick the deal that most suits you and save yourself a fortune 
If you plan on visiting Disneyland Paris and the Walt Disney studios, get two parks for the price of one, in this discounted one day ticket, also from 365 tickets . 
Get yours at 365tickets.co.uk/disneyland-paris . Free hotel and park tickets for kids under 7 
For each adult package booked for arrivals until 28 March 2017, children below 7 will be offered the same package for FREE . 
This includes complimentary hotel accommodation, breakfast at your hotel and entrance to both Disney Parks during your length of stay. 
The offer will be applied automatically at the checkout and will depend on your arrival dates. Book yours here. Read More
